37.eng-name: Trials and Fierce Battles (Kitab Al-Fitan Wa Al-Malahim)

hadiths.text: Abu Dawud said:Ibn 'Umar reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: The Muslims will soon be besieged up to Medina, so that their most distant frontier outpost will be Salah

chapter.eng-name: Mention Of Tribulations And Their Signs
